docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: General Information about ABM
docs.text:
Agent-based modeling (ABM) is ... '''

HAPPI (Heterogenous Agent-based Power Plant Investment) model

docs.title: Summary
docs.text:
HappiABM is an innovative, open-source agent-based model designed to explore and analyze the low-carbon transition of the power sector.

The code is accessible at HappiABM.

Related publication to this project can be found at this link
